name: Chinese Zhuge Nu Rush
description: Exploits the Song Dynasty for rapid [icon:villager] production. Crushes opponents with massive [icon:crossbowman] Zhuge Nu spam.

steps.description: Send 6 starting villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. Queue villagers.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house then [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold.
2nd new [icon:villager] to [icon:gold] gold. Total 2 on gold.
3rd new [icon:villager] builds [icon:lumber_camp] Lumber Camp. 4th new villager to [icon:wood] wood.
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:landmark] Barbican of the Sun! Use 2 villagers from food to build.
Immediately build [icon:landmark] Imperial Academy to trigger Song Dynasty.
[icon:upgrade] Song Dynasty reached! Build 2 [icon:archery_range] Archery Ranges.
[icon:attack] Mass [icon:crossbowman] Zhuge Nu! Push with 15+ units and an Imperial Official supervising.
